@ochocinco @ochocinco I've been stuck n hospital w sepsis since 6/1 husband's lost job w no unemployment 2 pay rent or get meds fixing 2 b homeless. My @CashApp is $Gastrofreak. Thank u
#ChadJohnson #OddGetWellGifts #coronavirus #COVID__19 #UnitedNotDivided #leadingthroughchange #BREAKING
